caption.p: a) Voltammetry of Au(111) in an AFM‐cell at 5 mV s −1 in 0.1 m Ca(ClO 4) 2 containing DMSO (100 % oxygen saturated). b–i) In situ AFM images show the topography on Au(111) in the indicated potential ranges upon discharge (b–e) and on charging (f–i); all potentials refer to Ag/Ag +. The inset in (i) shows the height profile. The color code (AFM‐frame and CV‐line) denotes the actual potential region. The arrow in the AFM images indicate the scan direction. Integral and proportional gains were 6 and 7, respectively. Scan size was 2×2 μm 2 and the scan rate was 19 nm s −1.
